name: rock-throw
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the foe to attack.
flavor_text.platinum: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the foe to attack.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the foe to attack.
